item.description:

I know that this must baffle consumers of right-wing media who see nothing but this type of reporting. The facts here are that a woman claims that Trump raped her 22 years ago, when she was 13, at a sex party.

item.title: Counterparty to Convert Card Game Players into Bitcoin Users
item.description:
Counterparty to Convert Card Game Players into Bitcoin Users

Counterparty, the peer-to-peer platform built on the Bitcoin Blockchain, enters the non-Bitcoin world by teaming up with the physical card game Force of Will as it prepares to launch its first digital game assets. The popular Japanese card game, Force of Will, is launching tokenized game items on Counterparty with the Force of Will Battle Simulator platform is expected to launch mid-September.

item.title: Wall Street Veteran Caitlin Long Joins Symbiont; Touts "Better Technology"
item.description:
Wall Street Veteran Caitlin Long Joins Symbiont; Touts "Better Technology"

In 2015 Bitcoin Magazine covered the launch of the fintech company Symbiont, focused on fostering a symbiotic relationship between traditional financial markets and cryptographic blockchain technology. The company raised $1.25 million of seed funding from influential financial market leaders, then in January it closed a $7 million funding round.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Consolidation Holds Course
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Consolidation Holds Course

Bitcoin price pulls lower toward horizontal support near $560. The outlook remains that the market is engaged in a sideways base formation prior to advance. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member? Join now.

item.title: SWIFT to Expose Bank Security Flaws Following New Hacks
item.description:
SWIFT to Expose Bank Security Flaws Following New Hacks

In what is becoming a grimly regular occurrence, SWIFT has confirmed further hacks to its member banks, with even more customer cash stolen. Also read: Hackers Claim To Breach NSA, WikiLeaks Claims Old News The news, shared by SWIFT in a memo this week, follows several hacks this year, resulting in stolen funds.

item.title: AntShares Partners with Microsoft to Digitalize Real-World Assets with Blockchain
item.description:
AntShares Partners with Microsoft to Digitalize Real-World Assets with Blockchain

Years ago little was known about Blockchain, and today thousands of enthusiasts successfully test and implement services built around it. AntShares is one of those platforms developed by strong believers in the immense potential of Blockchain. CoinTelegraph spoke with the CEO and Co-Founder of AntShares Da Hongfei about the project and its value for the market.

item.title: Bank of Canada Paper: Bitcoin Adoption Could Stabilize Price - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bank of Canada Paper: Bitcoin Adoption Could Stabilize Price - CoinDesk

The central bank of Canada has published a new working paper on the valuation of digital currencies that posits that exchange rate fluctuations will likely subside as the technology becomes more widely adopted. The paper, penned by researchers De Nederlandsche Bank's Wilko Bolt (the central bank of The Netherlands) and Maarten R.C.
